rows.name:
I'd better clean this area up.
Soon... Well, soonish...

Believe it or not, this place used to be
a bustling marketplace, before.

It's rare to get customers from abroad...
Oh, the bar area is still being prepared.

Welcome, welcome!
The bar area's open for business.
I saw a Luckroach over there!

Oho, that's the bug that brings
happiness! Something nice will happen!

Lazing under a tree with a good book...
Ahh, it doesn't get any better than this.
I hope one day I'll get to go outside!

Ahh...
That's pricey...
But play outside is more fun!

No way!
Reading books is more fun!

This is Luxuria's prestigious
Library Philosofia...

...and that's the story.
That's Luxuria's past in a nutshell.
I never knew!

Wow!
That's cool!
Hey, tell us another!

Muuuummyyy!
I'm huuuungryyyy!
Can we have fiiiish?

Okay, look, just drop the price another
100G and you'll have yourself a deal.
Okay, please? Come on...
Is that book any good?

*sigh*
I can't afford any of this makeup...

Heheheh, hey!
Let's scribble something on this wall!
Friend be sure to sign name, too!

Hey, check it out. I'm gonna
snowball that spaced-out dude...
It's cold outside. Please, do come in.

Grr, nobody's gonna attack us in here!
But no, I still have to patrol every day...
Stow it, buster! You're on duty.

I should get a Nopon's honest opinion
about my business plan.

There's a time to be sober, and a time 
to drink! Well, bottoms up!
Damn, I'm short again...
Snowball fighting!

I've got stuff you wouldn't find
in just any old daytime stall!

To be fair, that stall is a bit cheaper
than the daytime ones...
Still plenty expensive, though.

I heard there's a certain Blade sealed 
away somewhere in Teos Aure...

I pulled another all-nighter...
And now I feel horrid...
Oh, I'm starving!
Ah...
I wish life wasn't so bare-bones...

Anyone who makes a ruckus gets
dragged over to the palace. Life, eh?

We discuss official business all night
long... I wouldn't trade it for anything.
You better check it properly, or else!
